title.rendered: Mills Seed Starter Kit — The Bulldog Seeds x Mills Nutrients

content.rendered:
What you get: Mills Seed Starter Kit

  • Official The Bulldog Seeds and Mills Nutrients collaboration
  • Collector tin with four starter plugs and reusable cell tray
  • Mills Start R sample for root support in the first days
  • Clear humidity bag to create a simple micro greenhouse
  • Step-by-step germination guide for an easy setup

 

Step-by-step instruction video

excerpt.rendered: Start strong. Mills Seed Starter is the collab kit from The Bulldog Seeds and Mills Nutrients that takes the stress out of germination. Open the tin and get a clean four-cell tray with starter plugs, a mini bottle of Mills Start R, a clear humidity bag, and a simple step-by-step guide. The plugs hold moisture evenly, so seeds crack fast, and roots set deep. A few drops of Start R support early growth and keep young plants sturdy. It is compact, tidy, and built for repeatable results. Set it up in minutes and watch your seeds wake up the right way. Perfect for cannabis seeds, herbs, and anyone who wants a smooth start.

title.rendered: The Bulldog Amsterdam Metal 4-Part Grinder – Matte Silver

content.rendered:
Diamond-shaped teeth make light work of your herbs, giving you a consistent texture every time. At 50mm across, it’s the perfect size to slip in your pocket, and the magnetic closure keeps it secure while you’re on the move.

Need to make the most of every grind? The bottom chamber works as a kief catcher, collecting all that fine, potent goodness while you work. Perfect for saving up and sprinkling over a special roll. Finished in matte metal, it’s lightweight but tough enough for years of use. The Bulldog Amsterdam Metal 4-part grinder comes in matte metal finish, it’s lightweight but tough enough for years and years of use.

The Bulldog Amsterdam Metal 4-Part Grinder: Matte Silver 

  • Official The Bulldog Amsterdam merchandise
  • 4-part matte metal grinder – 50mm diameter
  • Diamond-shaped teeth for a smooth, even grind
  • Magnetic lid closure for secure use
  • Built-in stash compartment under the base
  • Lightweight, portable, and durable design

excerpt.rendered: Solid in the hand, smooth in the grind. The Bulldog Amsterdam Metal 4-Part Grinder – Worldwide edition – is built for anyone who takes their prep seriously. The lid shows off a full-size, engraved The Bulldog head, so there’s no mistaking the brand behind the bite.

title.rendered: The Bulldog Amsterdam Ashtray Tin –  Black

content.rendered:
At 120mm across, you and your crew have plenty of space. The design is bold, the build is solid, and it’s the kind of piece that works just as well on your coffee table as it does on a park bench by the canals.

More than just one look? Oh, we’ve got options. Collect all the colours or hunt down the city editions – Amsterdam, Barcelona, and Rome – and build your own Bulldog set.

The Bulldog Amsterdam Ashtray Tin: Black

  • Official The Bulldog Amsterdam merchandise
  • Tin ashtray with full-colour original logo
  • Diameter: 120mm
  • Lightweight, portable, and durable
  • Available in multiple colours and city editions

excerpt.rendered: Lightweight, portable, and stamped with The Bulldog’s original full-colour logo – this ashtray is ready to travel wherever you do. The Bulldog Amsterdam Ashtray Tin in Worldwide Black is made from sturdy tin, so it’s tough enough for daily use but light enough to throw in a bag without thinking twice.

title.rendered: The Bulldog Amsterdam Acrylic 3-Part Grinder –  Original & Authentic

content.rendered:
Pop it open, and those sharp pyramid teeth will get to work, shredding your herbs into a smooth, even texture in seconds. At 60mm wide, it’s the right size for a proper session: not too small or bulky. The magnetic closure keeps things tight while you work, and the stash compartment under the lid is perfect for holding a little extra for later.

The Bulldog Amsterdam grinder is made from sturdy acrylic, is ready for wear and tear and is perfect for life on the go.

The Bulldog Amsterdam Acrylic 3-Part Grinde: Black

  • Official The Bulldog Amsterdam merchandise
  • 3-part acrylic grinder – 60mm diameter
  • Sharp pyramid teeth for an effortless grind
  • Magnetic lid closure for a secure fit
  • Built-in stash compartment under the lid
  • Durable, drop-resistant design

excerpt.rendered: Built for the grind, not the shelf. The Bulldog Amsterdam Acrylic 3-Part Grinder in black is tough enough for daily use and light enough to take anywhere. The lid flashes the classic Bulldog logo, so everyone knows you’re rolling with the original.

content.rendered:
The Bulldog Clipper in black is not only one of the world’s most reliable lighters. It’s a piece of Amsterdam you can keep in your pocket.

The Bulldog Amsterdam Clipper: Black

  • Official The Bulldog Amsterdam merchandise
  • Original Clipper lighter: refillable with gas and replaceable flint
  • Iconic black finish with the famous The Bulldog Amsterdam logo
  • Solid feel, smooth spark, built for daily use
  • For smokers, collectors, anyone.

excerpt.rendered: This isn’t just a lighter. It’s The Bulldog Amsterdam in your pocket. The classic black Clipper, dressed with The Bulldog’s famous grin, is built to fire up whatever you’re rolling. Anywhere, anytime. Refillable. Reliable. Recognised worldwide. This is the original Clipper lighter, built to last and look good doing it.

title.rendered: Rolling Paper King Size Slim Unbleached

content.rendered:
The Bulldog Rolling Paper King Size Slim Unbleached offers the ultimate smoking experience for the conscious user. These premium papers are made from 100% unbleached paper, ensuring a pure taste without chemical additives.

Features:

  • Natural Quality: Made with a natural Arabic gum strip for perfect adhesion
  • Slow Burning: 14.5 gsm (grams per square meter) for an even, long-lasting smoking experience
  • King Size Slim Format: Generous dimensions of 109mm x 44mm for optimal ease of use
  • Environmentally Conscious: Packaged in a biodegradable booklet
  • Contents: 33 papers per booklet, 25 booklets per display

Combine these unbleached papers with our unbleached filter tips for the perfect, natural roll. The Bulldog has been known for decades for quality products, and these papers are no exception.

Experience the difference of unbleached papers – for a pure taste and a responsible choice.

content.rendered:
Papaya Cannabis Seeds – Tropical Chill, Amsterdam Attitude

With top US genetics, up to 25% THC, and a terpene profile juicier than an expensive brunch, Papaya cannabis seeds offer growers and smokers alike the best of both worlds: tropical flavour and TB Seeds reliability whether you’re after peace, pleasure, or a personal island moment. Papaya delivers; no boarding passes needed.

Heritage & Genetics: Papaya

Born with a passport.

Papaya’s story starts in the land of hybrids and hustle. Bred from power-packed US genetics that combines tropical sweetness with a heavy indica backbone. You get a compact plant with big dreams: resin-heavy buds, fast flowering, and a calm that stretches longer than a Dutch summer night.

At The Bulldog Seeds, we don’t just pick winners; we craft them. And this one? It’s a modern, chill classic, fine-tuned for those who appreciate good taste and no stress.

Appearance

Looks like a cocktail. Smokes like a charm.

Papaya grows short and solid, rocking that classic indica shape like it’s Amsterdam Fashion Week and indica is in season. Low to the ground, fast on the finish, and built like a strain that minds its business but gets things done. The flowers are bright green with bursts of burnt orange hairs, iced over by a tropical frost, so sticky that they should come with a warning label. It’s discreet, compact, and good-looking enough to get on the coffeeshop menu without even trying.

Growing Papaya

Small frame. Big rewards.

Papaya is a feminised cannabis strain made to make life easy. Indoors, it flowers in 8–9 weeks and reaches 400–450g/m² of terp-rich nugs. Outdoors? Give Papaya a bit of sun; it will produce up to 500g per plant with no fuss. These plants handle stress better than most hybrids and are great for first-time growers or seasoned heads who want solid, fruity returns without the drama. A perfect pick for smaller grows, balconies, or anyone who values quality over flash. Papaya is also ideal for extractors. Those dense, trichome-heavy buds mean tasty, fragrant returns for hash heads and rosin rollers.

Flavour & Aroma

Fruity with attitude. Amsterdam-approved.

Get handed a bag of this fruity US hybrid, and it’s like someone cracked a tropical smoothie over your head. Mango and papaya sweet citrus notes hit first, then give way to earthy, spicy undertones that ground it in proper cannabis tradition. It’s juicy but not jammy. It’s in your face but never pushy and has the kind of scent that earns a table at any coffee shop.

Effects: Papaya

Float mode: activated.

Papaya lifts gently at first with a cerebral hum that replaces edgy thoughts with smooth, round smiles. Then, like a long drift down the canals, it settles into a warm, full-body calm that makes time slow and tension melt. Ideal for post-session peace, quiet nights in, or tuning out the chaos with your favourite soundtrack.

With THC levels pushing up to 25%, Papaya is strong enough for seasoned smokers but smooth enough not to slap first-timers sideways.

Respect the fruit. *This is not one of your five-a-day

Terpene Profile

  • Myrcene is the terpene responsible for the infamous ‘couch lock’ or more positivity that helps you relax.
  • Limonene is one of the most common terpenes, is widely used in cleaning products, and is present in plants. It is what gives lemon cannabis strains their citrus taste and smell.
  • Caryophyllene is known to give cannabis strains a hint of spice.

Papaya Cannabis Seeds at The Bulldog Seeds

At The Bulldog Seeds, we don’t chase trends; we grow icons. Papaya brings together US hybrid power and our signature Amsterdam chill. It’s not just a plant. It’s a mindset. A lifestyle. A laid-back moment with roots in rebellion and fruit in your grinder.

The Papaya is Ripe at TB Seeds; we grew our legend; it’s time to grow yours!

excerpt.rendered:
A slice of sunshine with the swagger of The Bulldog Amsterdam.

Some cannabis strains are made to impress. Papaya is made to be chill AF. This Indica-dominant US hybrid doesn’t come to scream; it slides in smooth with fruity flair, sweet mango whispers, and a laid-back vibe that could out-chill a Bulldog lounging in the shade on Leidseplein.

content.rendered:
Biscotti Cannabis Seeds – The Bulldog Seed’s Sweetest Heavy-Hitter Yet

Heritage & Genetics: Biscotti

Born in the US. Made in Amsterdam.

Biscotti’s got roots in cannabis royalty. Gelato, known for its creamy smooth flavour and euphoric highs, meets South Florida OG, a Kush-style legend known for body-melting calm. This pairing created a US hybrid that is so good. It is a favourite sweet treat of The Bulldog Amsterdam, where high standards and even higher times have ruled since ’75.

Appearance

Biscotti looks as good as it feels. Dense, sticky nugs drenched in trichomes, with deep forest green and subtle purple flecks, all threaded with electric orange pistils. It’s a showpiece cannabis strain and the highlight of any coffeeshop menu.

Growing Biscotti

Easy to grow, hard to forget.

Flowering in just 8–9 weeks, Biscotti is a solid performer indoors and out. Expect yields of 350–450g/m² inside and up to 600g per plant outdoors if you treat her right. This US hybrid is rugged, compact, and resin-rich—perfect for beginners looking for a confidence boost or extract artists chasing quality rosin returns.

Beyond the stunning flowers, Biscotti is a grower’s dream. The US hybrid is stocky and low-maintenance. Think of a classic indica growth pattern with broad fan leaves and tight internodal spacing. The plant’s compact size makes her ideal for indoor tents, but if you care for these plants, they can perform well outdoors because they don’t mind the cold as much as some other cannabis hybrids.

The big thing about Biscotti is the amount of resin it produces; it is a resin monster. The heavy trichome production isn’t just for show; Biscotti is a popular favourite among concentrate fans. Run it for rosin or BHO, and you’ll get flavour-heavy extracts to die for.

Smell control might be needed, though, because once this indica hybrid is in bloom, it doesn’t whisper. Biscotti shouts sweet, gassy, and nutty funk loud enough to make your neighbours ask you to turn the music down.

Biscotti Flavour & Aroma

Get a whiff of Biscotti, and you’re hit with notes of nutty spice, creamy vanilla, and a little doughy funk that you don’t mind lingering. The inhale is smooth and sweet; the exhale? Spicy, earthy, and with just enough revs to remind you, this is still a heavy-hitter. Biscotti isn’t just tasty; it’s full-on gourmet.

Effects

The high is uplifting, euphoric, and creatively charged. Then, it melts into a blissful body stone that feels like an Amsterdam sunset by the canal: calm, warm, and perfectly hazy. At up to 30% THC, Biscotti is best reserved for those who like their weed strong and their stress to be gone.

Terpene Profile

  • Myrcene – Deep relaxation, that sink-into-the-sofa goodness or famous ‘couch lock’.
  • Alpha-Terpineol – Adds a floral, minty whisper to the flavour mix.
  • Linalool – Calming lavender-like touch to round it all off.

Biscotti Cannabis Seeds Online at TB Seeds

At TB Seeds, we’re not just selling cannabis seeds; we’re growing legends. With Biscotti, you get the best US genetics baked with The Bulldog’s legendary stamp. This one’s a no-brainer for those chasing flavour, frost, and full-body feels.

The Biscotti Legend is growing; it’s time to grow yours.

excerpt.rendered:
A treat of a hybrid that hits harder than a night at The Bulldog Amsterdam.

When you lace a sweet tooth’s dream with knockout potency, you get Biscotti, an indulgent indica-dominant US hybrid straight from the elite lineage of Gelato x South Florida OG. At 25–30% THC, this isn’t just smoke, it’s the Biscotti cannabis experience. Biscotti cannabis seeds deliver everything you’d expect from top-tier US genetics: flavour, firepower, and full-body bliss. Whether you want to unwind, dive into creative flow, or treat yourself after a long day, Biscotti takes the biscuit.

content.rendered:
Do-Si-Dos Cannabis Seeds – Spin, Sink, and Stay

Bred from OG Kush Breath (GSC pheno) and Face Off OG, Do-Si-Dos cannabis seeds give you the best of two heavyweight lineages: brain-tingling highs, deep-set calm, and a pungent funk that means business. It’s ideal for end-of-day sessions, long-haul recoveries, or any time you want the world to slow its spin without asking questions.

Heritage & Genetics: Do-Si-Dos

Bred in the States. Grown into Legend by The Bulldog Seeds.

Do-Si-Dos is the lovechild of OGKB (that rare, euphoric Girl Scout Cookies phenotype) and Face Off OG, a name that says it all. The result? A compact, trichome-coated strain: a modern classic. It’s been a quiet icon of the US cannabis scene and has danced its way into growers’ hearts and minds this side of the Atlantic.

Do Si Dos: Appearance

Tight formation. Frosted finish. Pure presence.

Do-Si-Dos grows low and sturdy, carrying a classic indica posture. The flowers are so dense and resin-rich that they look vacuum-sealed by Mother Nature herself. Hues range from lime green to lilac, laced with fiery orange pistils and glazed in a trichome shine that’ll make other strains feel underdressed.

Growing Do-Si-Dos

Quickstep, heavy yield.

This one’s made for growers who want speed and swagger. Flowering in 8–10 weeks, Do-Si-Dos performs reliably in indoor setups and outdoor spots that can handle a little attitude. Indoors? Expect 400–500g/m². Outdoors? Up to 500g per plant by October if you treat her right.

It’s compact, cooperative, and perfect for extractors who know the value of a plant that gives back in resin.

Flavour & Aroma: Do Si Dos

Earthy funk with a floral smirk.

This isn’t some fruit salad fantasy. Do-Si-Dos leans into its Kush roots with a powerful earthy aroma, touched by light herbal and floral notes from its Cookie side. Expect a fermented, nutty backdrop with just enough sweetness to intrigue, not overwhelm. The kind of smell that makes coffeeshop regulars lift their heads and sniff like something just got real.

Do Si Dos: Effects

Float. Fade. Full-stop.

It starts where your eyebrows are. A floaty, heady buzz that makes bad ideas seem like good ones for a moment. Then it moves like a slow spiral down your neck into your chest and finally lands where it wants to be: your legs.

This is an evening strain. A post-shift, post-session, post-everything kind of smoke. With up to 30% THC, it’s not for dabblers. If you’re looking for something to help you entirely switch off, this is the strain with the off button. It’s the kind of calm that hits harder than a tourist crashing at The Bulldog Hotel after a long week in the Dam.

Do Si Dos: Terpene Profile

  • Limonene – Adds a citrus lift to keep your head above the clouds.
  • Myrcene – The reason your legs feel like sandbags. In the best way.
  • Caryophyllene – Adds a peppery twist and a hint of hush.
  • Linalool – Rounds it all out with a floral, calming finish.

Do-Si-Dos Cannabis Seeds Online at The Bulldog Seeds

We don’t name-drop strains at The Bulldog Seeds; we grow icons. Do-Si-Dos is no exception. With top-tier US genetics, fierce THC levels, and a high that starts poetic and ends primal, this one’s built for smokers who take their downtime seriously.

Do-Si-Dos isn’t for dancing; it’s for planting, puffing, and parking yourself. We grew our legend. Go and grow yours!

🍬 Grow your own legend—Do-Si-Dos is calling! 🍬🔥

excerpt.rendered:
This isn’t a dance. It’s a graceful collab between US Genetics and The Bulldog Seeds.

Do-Si-Dos might be named after a light-footed swing on the dancefloor, but don’t be fooled. This indica-heavy US hybrid starts with a cerebral twirl and ends with you glued to your seat, wondering if it’s still Tuesday. With up to 30% THC, it’s one of the strongest feminised cannabis seeds in our collection, and it doesn’t ask for permission; it does what it wants.
